scripts.android:pre:build: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.ios:pre:build: npx react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:build: ios:pre:build && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace pilots.xcworkspace -scheme pilots -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos build CODE_SIGN_IDENTITY="iPhone Distribution" CODE_SIGN_STYLE="Manual" PROVISIONING_PROFILE="$(security find-identity -v -p codesigning | grep 'iPhone Distribution' | awk '{print $2}')"
